p: Considerable funding has been obtained for the REDD+ ( http://redd.unfccc.int/) scheme. Nevertheless, meaningful emission reduction or revenues from C credits have not been achieved in Indonesia at least. Earlier initiatives have shown promising results, albeit slowly, in the number of companies moving toward certification of forest management (Dermawan, Sinaga, Williams, Standing, & Dupuy, 2015). REDD+ proposals include growing OP on reclaimed soil and replacing the use of fertilizer with other methods. Overall, the REDD+ scheme is still being developed where the apparently worthwhile proposals need carrying out in a verifiable manner.
